title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.14 - Record of checkers assigned to motor vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.14 - Record of checkers assigned to motor vehicles

State Regulations

Every licensed stevedore shall cause to be recorded on the
appropriate documents reflecting delivery or removal of cargo to or from the
pier or other waterfront terminal by motor vehicle, the full names of all
checkers assigned to such vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
3.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
